tags: Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I will never recommend Dr. Nita misra to any friend or anybody I know. Apart from long waiting time (1.5 hour) even after taking the appointment 2 days in advance the most disturbing thing was the behaviour of doctor. I took my mother for menopause complications she is having. The doctor at first listen and discussed the medical history of my mother then started scaring us of cervical cancer.. and pushing me to take the vaccine for cervical cancer which is available at her clinic. * ** * ******** ******* ** * ** **** ***** ** *** ********** *** ********** ***** ** ************ *********** ***** ******* ** ** *** ******* ** ** *** ********** *** ******** ******* Though the patient was my mother. The interesting part it, once you go to her clinic, her receptionist does not charge you before seeing the doctor. Instead she insists to first let the doctor examine you and then you can pay her. The catch is, that even though you are visiting the doctor for regular consultations she does this pap smear test. ***** ** ******** ** ** **** **** ** * ****** *** *** ****** **** ** **** ** *** **** *** **** *** *** ** ***** ** *** **** *** *** **** ******* ****** ********** **** *** ***** **** *** **** ***** **** **** *** *** ***** ***** **** ** ** ******* 4 days later we got the report in which she was negative for cervical cancer , however she had some infection in uterus. When we took the reports to doctor she scared by telling my mother on her face that cancer ho skta. This is what she said when she didn't even flip the page of the report to see the result. Though her receptionist prompted her that the report is negative but she continued to scare me and my mother and later got to me convincing to get vaccine from her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Appalling experience, In this day and age of internet doctors should be open to the fact that patient will not just accept their consult without question. I took my wife for  pcod , and my wife and I  were researching this for some time , so I wanted to discuss more and get clarification around course of treatment. The minute I asked questions she got angry wtih  me *** ***** * **** ****** * I never questioned her intelligence or experience just wanted to  her help to make a good decision. Doctor should understand that they are consultant and  we are their seeking help from pain not judgement.

I do not recommend this doctor as I visited with my wife for regular pregnancy check up and wanted to consult about planning for second child. She did *********** checkup which is just not expected from such a experienced doctor. She even did a uturus cancer check ***** * ***** ** *** ******** ** *** ** *** **** *** ******** My wife is in her early thirties, so age is also not that much. The main thing is my wife do not have any issue. *** ****** ** **** **** ***** *** ** *** ******* *** * ******* ****** *** **** ** *** Not recommended at all ****** *** **** ** *** ***** ********** * ****** * *** **** ******** ** **** * ***********

review: It was a great experience as the dr explained all our queries, we were highly comfortable with the dr in discussing our issues .
